ASP.NET Controls for amCharts 1.6.4.0
-------------------------------------

Installation
------------
Copy am.Charts.dll to ~/Bin directory of your web application

Usage and Documentation
-----------------------
Product details and documenation downloads
http://www.amcharts/aspnet/

Quick usage guide
http://www.amcharts.com/docs/v.1/bundle/asp/basics

Online API reference
http://www.amcharts.com/aspnet/documentation/
